title: Can we please get an Invis status option?
body:
Sometimes I just want to play a couple stupid games on my own.  A lot of the people I play with want to play with me, but only play ranked.  I on the other hand generally prefer the casual fun of normals, and the freedom to play whatever champions I want to at the time.

I can't think of a reason to not have this option in the game, and it would probably result in a moderate increase in play rate as people are willing to go on more often if they aren't being harassed.

Unless this would cost quite a bit for Riot to implement, they should just add this.  It'd be nice for those players who would use it, and it would result in more play.

replies.body: That'd be nice, yeah. I'm not quite sure how client works without looking through the code, but if I'm assuming correctly, it's probably take a change in an if statement, And adding a few lines, maybe an object and ways for that to interact through methods if it's coded how I would have done it. (I'm still learning Java in a high school computer science class though so how I would do something might not be the best way to implement something.)
